column1: Narrator : A tiny raft hits the hull of NOMBATEAU. A morbidly skinny person calls for help towards CAPITAINE
PlayerSpeak : We have nothing to do here !
OtherSpeak : I’ve been eating nothing but jellyfishes for days.
OtherSpeak : Take me with you I beg you !
column3: OtherSpeak : I beg you, leave me alive

column2: Choice : Give us everything or we’ll kick your ass.(attaquer)
column4: Choice : Sorry buddy, not enough room on board
OtherSpeak : Give me at least something to eat !

column1: Choice : Buddy you’re in luck, we’re off (partir)
Narrator : The raft is empty. It was on the brink of dismantling itself

column3: PlayerSpeak : This one was a reader apparently…
column4: PlayerSpeak : A lantern ! How did he light it ?
